page.title: 12A Typical Day in our Life 1.
page.content: I wake up because it begins to get light and the sun shines through my curtains. It is{7 a.m.}I read a book to pass the time. My Mum comes in to tell me to go down to{breakfast.}For {breakfast}I have{cereal, toast}and a {drink.}When I finish{breakfast}I get {washed and dressed.}We put{T-shirts and{skirts}or{dresses}or{trousers}on. Then we{clean our teeth.}When we go out we put our{shoes}and{coats}on and say "Bye". We go to{school}with our {brothers}or{sisters,}or in our{family {car.}On the way to{school}we meet our {friends.}When we get to{school}we play {skipping}with a{rope}in the {playground.}At{9 o'clock}we go inside. We hang up our{coats}and do our {register}and{daily book.}Next we do some work like{reading}and{spelling. At{10.15}we go out to{play.}We can go on the grass.{
